text: Tapa'ile pachadi chodi'eka badduharusita bhanidinus ki timiharu sighra nai e'uta bado ladaku kauma(samudaya) sita yud'dhako nimti bola'inechau. Uniharusita timi yud'dha garirahane chau va uniharule islama svikara garihalnechan, ra yadi timile adesapalana gardachau bhane allahale timila'i ramro pratiphala pradana garnecha ra yadi mukha pharka'umchau jasto ki yasabhanda pahila timi mukha pharka'eka thiyau ta usale timila'i kastadayaka yatana dinecha
